Articles.Content:
False.

The user below me has heard Balla Da Li (A.K.A. The Awesome Face Song).

False

the person below me plays KSP

How could you guess? I'm doing it right now, waiting for my orbit to complete

The next user has been on either the south or the north pole.

True (at least on ksp, if thats what you mean)

The user below me exists.

True. But you'll never know if what i says is true... I could be a computer...

I actually meant IRL, btw

The next user/thing to comment has watched asdfmovie.

True.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_detailpage&v=Mw2cTlY9xDc

The user below me likes Monty Python.

Nope, never heard of it.

The next user wish they could play fight zombies back in 1976.

(Seriously, I'm joking. That would probably only happen in Plants vs. Zombies, a game by PopCap.)

Not really, no.

The person below me has seen the Avengers, and found it to be a guilty pleasure.

I have seen it, but I don't know what you mean by finding it to be a guilty pleasure.

The person below is a troll on YouTube.

I was a dick to some Beleibers once. Not sure if that counts.

The user below me plays Space Engine.

False, what's space engine?

User below me has mined all the kethane from gilly

Don't have the kethane mod.

The user below me doesn't like the Minecraft community.

True, kind of. I dislike the real hardcore fandom behind the game but I am fine with everyone else. Plus if I hate them to much I can't play the great game anymore.

The user below me is farther south than me.(Florida)

Possibly true, depends on the exact latitude, but i won't ask for specifics.

The user below me has never heard of the Time And Relative Dimension In Space.

Edited May 8, 2013 by Dynamo

True,

The user below me doesn't get headaches when general relativity is discussed.

False. But I try to understand.

The user below me has already defeated the Enderdragon.

True. Me and my team then erected a stonehenge-style temple with the dragon egg in the middle (We called it The Temple of the Ender's Left Testicle)

The user below has had salt thrown in their face

Nope. I don't plan on it either.

The user below me thinks that all animals are equal, some are just more equal than others.

Edited May 8, 2013 by Nutt007

False. Free animals! Viva la Animals!(But wolfs are better)

The user below me has three seconds to live.

False!

The user bellow me is located on the western half of his/for country

False.

The user below me have fired a Bazooka at some point in life.

False. RPG.

The user below me is in school right now.

False, I would be if I didn't have a doctors appointment

The user below me has sent clones of bill, Jeb, and bob into the sun

True

The person below me is not swedish

False

The user below me is female.
